content.text: Hi! I am a huge fan of psychological thrillers. What are some of your favorite movies in this genre?
Hello! I love psychological thrillers too. I recently read a book called "The Silent Patient" and I really enjoyed it.
I have not heard of that book. I will have to check it out. What do you like so much about the genre?
I like how they keep you guessing until the very end. I also like how they can really make you think about your own life.
Me too. I like to see how the characters react to the situations they are in. It helps me learn about myself.
I agree. I think it is a great way to learn about yourself.
I just got back from vacation. I spent some time on the beach playing my guitar.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I am not a very good guitar player.
It is not that hard to learn. I took lessons when I was a kid.
Maybe I will take some lessons one day.
You should! It is a lot of fun.
Thanks for the advice! I will keep it in mind.
